main event: A police detective noticed a bright, circular object hovering in the sky on the morning of 27 July 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as being 30 to 40 feet in diameter.,The object emitted a brilliant light.,It hovered for several minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing.,The witness reported being shaken by the experience.,The incident was investigated but no further findings were provided.
sighted object: a bright circular object emitting light in the sky
